issue.title: SDK Install tutorial: Create a new Windows SDK zip

content.raw: I'll do this task during the release of a new handsim version. If we generate and upload a new SDK now, it will include the latest version of ign-transport that won't be able to communicate with the version that teams currently have (we changed the wire format).
content.html: I'll do this task during the release of a new handsim version. If we generate and upload a new SDK now, it will include the latest version of ign-transport that won't be able to communicate with the version that teams currently have (we changed the wire format).
